title: Email with attachment does not appear in Thunderbird
content: My wife sent me an email with a small word file to my Yahoo and I see the email when I log into Yahoo but not Thunderbird. I have always been able to receive emails with attachments before so don't know what to do. I'd be fine if I saw the email without the attachment but no email shows up at all in Thunderbird, only Yahoo email.
creator: jamesvelasquez1

title: Font Color Changes Within an Email
content:
Hi all,

I'm writing an email reply and wanted to answer questions in a red font. So, my top line reply was "see below in red" and then I wanted to type Yes or No in red after each question. I couldn't even copy and paste from a word document with the font in red.

In Thunderbird, I clicked on the color checker, typed in FF0000 for the color code and clicked yes. Then the color selecter boxes on the menu went right back to white.

Any ideas?
creator: dmsolomon

title: cox to yahoo mail
content: cox migrated their email system to yahoo but i dont believe yahoo uses usernames anymore, just email addresses so i cant set up my email to thunderbird since it requires a username and like i said i dont think one exists anymore.

title: Do not see first e-mail
content:
When downloading incoming e-mails the first one is always hidden under this heading line:

To see/read it I have to scroll it down. How come? /hans peter
creator: hans_peter

title: Thunderbird at times reports emails received but none appear in Inbox
content: When checking email, Thunderbird's status bar at the bottom will report x number of emails received (e.g., "received 1 of 1 messages"). I have not had difficulty receiving email and those messages displaying in the Inbox--but there have been a number of instances where the status bar will report one or more messages have been received, but none display, despite the fact that I do not nor have I ever had filtering in place. Since I continue to receive emails that display when received, the only thing that concerns me is that there could be messages that are being lost, and I have no idea how to correct the problem and be assured that each and every email is retrieved and displayed. Thank you for your assistance.
creator: comicsfan

title: Reading emails.
content: Hi, I believe in the past I was able to read an email by clicking on it and it would appear on the left of the main page. However, now whenever I click an email it opens in a new tab. This makes reading them take considerably longer. Is there any way to switch back to having them appear on the side instead of opening a new window/tab?
creator: General23

title: not receiving emails on one of mt TB accounts on my PC.  Coming through on iphone thoguh

title: Intestazioni email con testo barrato
content: Salve, dopo avere fatto una migrazione di un account da una istallazuione ad un'altra vedo le intestazioni delle emals cancellate con testo barrato nella finestra posta in arrivo, La cosa succede solo nell'account specificato, non succede negli altri. Sono email spostate sulla mia cartelle spam dal filtro automatico. Anche negli altri account applico i filtri ma i messaggi spostati non sono visibili. Allego screenshot della cartella.
creator: amesultel
